content:
TB Menu Bar > Tools > Address Book (or open it from the from sidebar) > click the 'Create a new mailing list' icon.

(Most don't see the top [Menu bar](https://i.imgur.com/OTvCzJ6.png), as it's hidden by default. If you don't see it, press the ALT key. To make the menu bar always visible, press ALT + V, then T, then M.) > Address Book
creator: siffemoz

content: Can you drag it to the desired position in the folder pane?

content: Hallo. Thunderbird-mail.de - http://www.thunderbird-mail.de/wiki/Hauptseite oder Hilfe - https://support.mozilla.org/de/kb/hilfe-durch-unsere-gemeinschaft-erhalten?exit_aaq=1.

content:
Try to rebuild the index file of the troubled folder.

Right-click the folder - Properties - Repair Folder
